author: potuz
content:

So it seems that it won't load 43943. cc <@!363800010518822915>, I've got no clue what's the cause of this, but FWIW, our optimistic syncing right now it's quite a naive implementation of the spec one

author: potuz
content: Update: removed geth's dbase, restarted the node with the CL optimistically synced up to yesterday's head. Prysm catched up to head and triggered `forkChoiceUpdated`  which in turn sent geth to sync, and this time it synced quickly to head. So I do not know if the bug above getting stuck trying to send block 43943 to the freezer is a bug in geth or caused by a bug in prysm, but now I have a fully synced Kintsugi node
